Class OptimizerUtil

java.lang.Object
com.serenitask.util.routine.OptimizerUtil
public class OptimizerUtil extends Object
Class containing optimizer utility functions that are static.

    • commitEntries

      public static void commitEntries(List<com.calendarfx.model.Entry<?>> entries, com.calendarfx.model.Calendar goalCalendar)
      Method takes a list of entries and the calendar to inset them into.
      Parameters:
      entries - List of Entry objects representing calendar events
      goalCalendar - Target calendar to attach entries to

    • getNextSunday

      public static LocalDate getNextSunday(LocalDate startDate)
      Takes in a LocalDate value and returns the date of the nearest sunday.
      Parameters:
      startDate - any LocalDate object
      Returns:
      LocalDate of the closest following sunday

    • splitDays

      public static List<List<Event>> splitDays(LocalDate start, LocalDate end, List<Event> eventList)
      Function takes in a start and end date spanning a period of time. Parses the given eventList from start date to end date and creates a list of events per date. Returns a list of these day lists.
      Parameters:
      start - LocalDate object representing the start date of the allocation period
      end - LocalDate object representing the end date of the allocation period
      eventList - List object containing all given events.
      Returns:
      List of Lists. Splits all events into lists of lists

    • getGoalCalendar

      public static com.calendarfx.model.Calendar getGoalCalendar(List<com.calendarfx.model.Calendar> calendars, String Target)
      Takes in a list of calendars and a target calendar as a string and returns the calendar with the name Goals
      Parameters:
      calendars - List of calendars in CalendarSource
      Target - String name of calendar
      Returns:
      Calendar object representing Goals calendar

    • getSortedList

      public static List<Event> getSortedList(List<Event> unsortedlist)
      Takes in a single event list and sorts it based on start times. returns the list sorted in chronological order
      Parameters:
      unsortedlist - An unsorted list of event objects
      Returns:
      Chronologically sorted list of events

    • createDay

      public static Day createDay(List<Event> list, LocalTime dayStart, LocalTime dayEnd, LocalDate date)
      Takes in a list of events for a single date, a starting time and end time. Creates a day object and allocates all free windows of time to the day.
      Parameters:
      list - List of events for a single date
      dayStart - LocalTime object representing start of the users day
      dayEnd - LocalTime object representing end of the users day
      date - Localdate object representing the date of the day
      Returns:
      A Day Object representing the Date

    • getTargetDate

      public static LocalDate getTargetDate(int allocationThreshold)
      Gets the current date and returns a future date based on the allocationThreshold class parameter if current date is a sunday, will return date + (allocationThreshold) days if current date is not sunday, will return date + (allocationThreshold + n days) days
      Returns:
      new LocalDate used for target date

    • calcOffsetMins

      public static int calcOffsetMins(int windowMins, int eventDuration)
      Calculates the random offset value when generating events. Offset values will be in steps of 15 minutes to avoid unsightly event allocations
      Parameters:
      windowMins - Number of minutes in the given window
      eventDuration - Duration of the given event
      Returns:
      Integer in steps of 15m
